mentionedBy.name: Zoom Video Communications Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Formerly Hangouts Meet, best-known video meeting platform available free for anyone with Google or Gmail account

mentionedBy.name: Zoom Video Communications Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Made free to all users worldwide in May 2020 (previously paid service for educators) to compete with Zoom, supports up to 100 participants with 16 visible at a time, integrated with G Suite

mentionedBy.name: Zoom Video Communications Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Significant competitor integrated with Google Workspace, 5.52% market share, offers 1-hour meetings for free users (vs Zoom's 40 minutes), leverages Google's cloud computing expertise

mentionedBy.name: Zoom Video Communications Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Integrated with Google Workspace with over 300 million monthly users. Strong presence especially in education sector. Benefits from tight integration with Gmail, Calendar, and other Google productivity tools.

2015.note: Formerly Hangouts Meet, best-known video meeting platform available free for anyone with Google or Gmail account

2020.note: Made free to all users worldwide in May 2020 (previously paid service for educators) to compete with Zoom, supports up to 100 participants with 16 visible at a time, integrated with G Suite

2024.note: Significant competitor integrated with Google Workspace, 5.52% market share, offers 1-hour meetings for free users (vs Zoom's 40 minutes), leverages Google's cloud computing expertise

2025.note: Integrated with Google Workspace with over 300 million monthly users. Strong presence especially in education sector. Benefits from tight integration with Gmail, Calendar, and other Google productivity tools.
